item.title: Need help with player rights command
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

Ok im adding a staff are and this is my code

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2976; teleportToY = 3615; sendMessage("Staff area!"); } }
Where to i put the player rights? thanks
